quick_start.title: New console app
quick_start.code:
dotnet new console -n Hello && cd Hello
dotnet run

tasks.title: Read a file
tasks.code:
using System; using System.IO;
class P{ static void Main(){ var s = File.ReadAllText("README.md"); Console.WriteLine(s.Substring(0, Math.Min(200, s.Length))); }}

tasks.title: Write JSON
tasks.code:
using System; using System.IO; using System.Text.Json;
class P{ static void Main(){ var obj = new { ok = true, items = new[]{1,2,3} }; var json = JsonSerializer.Serialize(obj, new JsonSerializerOptions{ WriteIndented = true }); File.WriteAllText("data.json", json); }}

tasks.title: GET JSON
tasks.code:
using System; using System.Net.Http; using System.Threading.Tasks;
class P{ static async Task Main(){ using var c = new HttpClient(); var s = await c.GetStringAsync("https://httpbin.org/json"); Console.WriteLine(s); }}

tasks.title: Arguments
tasks.code:
using System;
class P{ static void Main(string[] args){ Console.WriteLine(string.Join(",", args)); }}
